TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː s k ʌ m s t eɪ l ə n æ s k h ɚ t uː b ɹ iː ð ɪ z θ ɪ ŋ z v ɪ dʒ h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ə s d ɔːɹ s ɪ k s b oʊ v s ʌ v f l ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p ɪ z f aɪ n t ɪ ŋ k s l eɪ p s ʌ b l oʊ tʃ ɪ z æ n m eɪ b iː ɐ s n eɪ k ʌ f ɔːɹ h ɜː b ɹ ʌ ɹ ɚ b oʊ w ɪ ɔː l s oʊ n iː ʌ s m ɔː p l ɛ k l æ s t eɪ k n ɪ k æ n ð ə ɐ p ɪ k t ɔː f ɹ ʌ ŋ ɡ f ɔːɹ ð k eɪ t ʃ iː k æ n s k uː ð eɪ d θ ɪ ŋ z ɪ ŋ t uː θ ɹ iː ɹ æ ɡ p ɡ z æ d w eɪ ɪ ɡ oʊ m ɪ ð h ɚ w ɛ n s d eɪ æ t ə t ɹ iː s t eɪ ʃ ə n
